description:
The Monaco Cup has officially begun, and Team Japan’s fate rests on their luck with the roulette. Will they get the ingredients they need? Can they possibly make a bread just with eggs?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Korezo Sekai Level!! Arashi o Yobu Roulette!
This Is Truly World-Class Level!! The Roulette That Brings Chaos!
Voilà le niveau mondial ! La roulette infernale !
นี่แหละระดับโลก รูเล็ทที่เรียกพาย
これぞ世界レベル!! 嵐を呼ぶルーレット!
